summary: I catalogued the profiles of prospective students to generate a more systematic approach to profiling students. Managed and advised community outreach team in recruiting students throughout New York City’s five boroughs. Trained fourteen interns on how to evaluate a prospective student’s financial aid application.

role: Software Development Intern with Corporate Technology, Finance Risk
summary: Created a database driven website that provided mechanisms for LOB (line of business) users to easily attest to feeds. Improved the UI of the web app with functional grid coded in Ext JS.  Coded SQL queries that pull feeds from a database and refreshed website with retrieved feeds.  Transferred LOB users old feed inventories from an excel sheet to an organized grid with greater functionality.  Developed backend for web app using Java and Spring Framework.

Augmented bPaid, a £450 million digital program Barclays commissioned to put Barclaycard at forefront of payments.  Advised and redesigned onboarding processes and servicing strategies of small merchants and large enterprises.  Analyzed self-serving capabilities as economical means of eliminating expenses to firm.
